description: I bet Johnny Knoxville would love this next act! Montaz Morgan is ready to complete his tattoo work. The final piece is his cock. This is a real tattoo shot in real time action. As Montaz cries and whines in pleasure and pain, the needle buzzes and whirs it's way down his dick. Bzzzzz! Bzzzzzzzzzz! Bzz! He even stops the action half way through and begs for a break. This is the real thing folks! When someone says a tattoo hurts, you'll know it for sure now! And to make it even crazier, this fucker starts jerking his raw dick as soon as the artist gets done working on him. He cums, screaming for mercy from his own hand. It's cum and ink and it's all happening here! Right before your eyes, folks!
title: Ink Storm, Scene #02
